body:
From the current HEAD of develop (14441e00d), #15039 somehow caused the `readline` includes to no longer be available when building R- even though the package is definitely installed. I have a feeling this may not be the only package affected, but it's the only place I've seen this happen.

See also the discussion in #14793.
